title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
tells you to be careful, she warns you to not let her take advantage of you, as she sees your kindness as a weakness. Your next set of choices will look like this:

And what exactly is a crèche...? A simple 'thank you' wouldn't go amiss. All right, we journey together. Let's find this crèche. We'll go our separate ways, I think.

The two choices that will matter are choices 3 and 4. The first two choices will only extend the conversation. When asked about a crèche, Lae'zel explains that it is m
